Bam! Paul morphy played against this, one of my favorite games. black played Bg4 here, but the pin doesn't help black. 3...Bg4 4. de Bxf3 5. Qxf3 de 6. Bc4! Nf6 7. Qb3! hitting the f7 pawn and b7 pawn. Morphy plays a knight sac and wins the game!!
this seems dubius. and a wasted tempo to move it twice.
